title: Discord OSINT Assistant: A Comprehensive Open Source Intelligence Gathering Platform
description: A professional-grade Discord bot providing specialized commands for Open Source Intelligence (OSINT) gathering and analysis. The platform offers comprehensive digital reconnaissance capabilities including domain analysis, identity investigation, blockchain analysis, transportation intelligence, image metadata extraction, and AI-powered analysis. Designed for investigators, researchers, security professionals, and educational institutions conducting legitimate OSINT research.
notes: This software is designed for legitimate OSINT research, security testing, and educational purposes. Users are responsible for ensuring compliance with applicable laws and ethical guidelines. The platform provides comprehensive intelligence gathering capabilities through an accessible Discord interface, supporting collaborative investigations and research workflows.
